original_text:
The Lord enters into judgment
    against the elders and leaders of his people:
“It is you who have ruined my vineyard;
    the plunder from the poor is in your houses.
korean_text: 여호와께서 자기 백성의 장로들과 고관들을 심문하러 오시리니 포도원을 삼킨 자는 너희이며 가난한 자에게서 탈취한 물건이 너희의 집에 있도다

sentences.original_text: against the elders and leaders of his people:
It is you who have ruined my vineyard;
the plunder from the poor is in your houses.
sentences.korean_translation: 가난한 자에게서 빼앗은 것이 너희 집에 있도다
